Structure# IOHardwareCursorDescriptor

Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.0+

```
typedef struct IOHardwareCursorDescriptor {
    ...
} IOHardwareCursorDescriptor;
```

## [Topics](/documentation/iokit/iohardwarecursordescriptor#topics)

### [Instance Properties](/documentation/iokit/iohardwarecursordescriptor#2862759)

[`bitDepth`](/documentation/iokit/iohardwarecursordescriptor/1505720-bitdepth)Number bits per pixel, or a QD/QT pixel type, for example kIO8IndexedPixelFormat, kIO32ARGBPixelFormat.[`colorEncodings`](/documentation/iokit/iohardwarecursordescriptor/1505587-colorencodings)An array pointer specifying the pixel values corresponding to the indices into the color table, for indexed pixel types.[`flags`](/documentation/iokit/iohardwarecursordescriptor/1505608-flags)None defined, set to zero.[`height`](/documentation/iokit/iohardwarecursordescriptor/1506025-height)Maximum size of the cursor.[`majorVersion`](/documentation/iokit/iohardwarecursordescriptor/1505436-majorversion)Set to kHardwareCursorDescriptorMajorVersion.[`maskBitDepth`](/documentation/iokit/iohardwarecursordescriptor/1505546-maskbitdepth)Unused.[`minorVersion`](/documentation/iokit/iohardwarecursordescriptor/1505743-minorversion)Set to kHardwareCursorDescriptorMinorVersion.[`numColors`](/documentation/iokit/iohardwarecursordescriptor/1505035-numcolors)Number of colors for indexed pixel types.[`specialEncodings`](/documentation/iokit/iohardwarecursordescriptor/1505679-specialencodings)Array of pixel values for each supported special encoding.[`supportedSpecialEncodings`](/documentation/iokit/iohardwarecursordescriptor/1506135-supportedspecialencodings)Mask of supported special pixel values, eg. kTransparentEncodedPixel, kInvertingEncodedPixel.[`width`](/documentation/iokit/iohardwarecursordescriptor/1505052-width)Maximum size of the cursor.
